vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Marriage.sendMessage (patch_7.sol#105-115) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_7.sol#111)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Owned.changeOwner (patch_7.sol#17-19) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Owned.acceptOwnership (patch_7.sol#21-26) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function execute(address _dst, uint _value, bytes _data) onlyOwner public {
        require(_dst.call.value(_value)(_data));
vulnerability_findings.message: Owned.execute (patch_7.sol#28-30) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (patch_7.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function execute(address _dst, uint _value, bytes _data) onlyOwner public {
        require(_dst.call.value(_value)(_data));
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Owned.execute (patch_7.sol#28-30):
	-require(bool)(_dst.call.value(_value)(_data)) patch_7.sol#29
